exceptions.tactic: apply freeVarSubAllTerm1 in H as [a [Ha1 Ha2]].
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (t : fol.Term L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat), In v (freeVarTerm L (subAllTerm t m)) -> exists n : nat, In n (freeVarTerm L t) /\\ In v (freeVarTerm L (m n))" on hypothesis of type "In v (freeVarTerms L (S n) (Tcons L n (subAllTerm t m) (subAllTerms n ts m)))".

exceptions.tactic: specialize (IHts m v H) as [a [Ha1 Ha2]].
exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language H0 : forall (t : fol.Term L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat), In v (freeVarTerm L (subAllTerm t m)) -> exists n : nat, In n (freeVarTerm L t) /\\ In v (freeVarTerm L (m n)) n : nat t : fol.Term L ts : fol.Terms L n m : nat -> fol.Term L v : nat IHts : In v (freeVarTerms L n (subAllTerms n ts m)) -> exists a : nat, In a (freeVarTerms L n ts) /\\ In v (freeVarTerm L (m a)) H : In v (freeVarTerms L (S n) (Tcons L n (subAllTerm t m) (subAllTerms n ts m))) The term "m" has type "nat -> fol.Term L" while it is expected to have type "In v (freeVarTerms L n (subAllTerms n ts m))".
The reference a was not found in the current environment.
Wrong bullet *: Current bullet * is not finished.

original: intros n ts m v. induction ts using Terms_ind. - simpl. intros. contradiction. - simpl. intros [H | H]. + apply freeVarSubAllTerm1 in H as [a [Ha1 Ha2]]. exists a. split. * left. auto. * auto. + specialize (IHts m v H) as [a [Ha1 Ha2]]. exists a. split. * right. auto. * auto.
